```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(cowplot)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(measurements)

pesticides <- read.csv(file="vHoneyNeonic_v03.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",")
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pesticides_clean <- na.omit(pesticides)

pesticides_year <- pesticides_clean %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(production_year=sum(totalprod))

pesticides_year2 <- pesticides_clean %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(neonics_year=sum(nAllNeonic))

pesticides_year_total <- merge(pesticides_year, pesticides_year2)

ggplot(data=pesticides_year,aes(x=year, y=production_year/1000000)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Years") +
  ylab("Total amount of honey production in the US in lb")
  theme_bw()
  
ggplot(data=pesticides_year2,aes(x=year, y=neonics_year/1000000)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Years") +
  ylab("Total amount of neonic pesticides applied in the US in lb")
  theme_bw()

```


```{r}
p <- ggplot(pesticides_year_total, aes(x = year))
p <- p + geom_line(aes(y = production_year, colour = "Production"))

  
 
p <- p + geom_line(aes(y = neonics_year*50, colour = "Pesticides"))
  
  
#p <- p + scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~./50, name = "Amount of neonics applied in lb"))
p <- p + scale_y_continuous(breaks=c())
  
 
p <- p + scale_colour_manual(values = c("blue", "red"))
p <- p + labs(y = "Amount of honey produced in M lb",
                x = "Year",
                colour = "Parameter")
p <- p + theme_bw()
p
```
